name: Weather Together
description:
Play through the seasons to defeat an unknown power. Make allies? Defeat foes? Can you really make a difference? It's your adventure, why not try it?

Playable with Xbox Controller and Keyboard. Don't worry about controls too much; the game will tell you them, but here's a reminder if you forget:

Keyboard:

  • Arrows to move
  • Q to Shoot when Blaster is obtained
  • W to Freeze with Coolio
  • Shift to Swtich
  • Enter to Pause

Controller:

  • Joystick to move
  • RT to Shoot when Blaster is obtained
  • LT to Freeze with Coolio
  • Y to Swtich
  • Start to Pause
